lead_paragraph: Not many people talk badly of Pep Guardiola, a sainted figure in football, but Manchester City's manager will find two of his most vocal critics facing him down at Old Trafford on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Mourinho and Guardiola the Best of Enemies
headline.main: Mourinho and Guardiola the Best of Enemies

snippet: Not many people talk badly of Pep Guardiola, a sainted figure in football, but Manchester City's manager will find two of his most vocal critics facing him down at Old Trafford on Saturday....
